turns.content: Write the brief and catch lyrics to a new upbeat IDM pop track

"Neon Dreams"

Verse 1:
I'm feeling alive, electric energy
Pulse racing, my heart is beating like a drum
I'm living my life in technicolor
I'm chasing my dreams, I won't let them succumb

Chorus:
Oh-oh, oh-oh, I'm chasing my neon dreams
Oh-oh, oh-oh, I won't let them slip away
I'm reaching for the stars, I'm feeling unstoppable
I'm chasing my neon dreams, they'll never fade

Verse 2:
I've got the music in my veins, it's driving me insane
I'm unstoppable, I won't be held down
I'm reaching for the sky, I won't stop until I fly
I'm living for the moment, I won't let it drown

Chorus:
Oh-oh, oh-oh, I'm chasing my neon dreams
Oh-oh, oh-oh, I won't let them slip away
I'm reaching for the stars, I'm feeling unstoppable
I'm chasing my neon dreams, they'll never fade

Bridge:
I won't give up, I won't give in
I'll keep on dancing until the end
I'm chasing my neon dreams, they'll never fade

Chorus:
Oh-oh, oh-oh, I'm chasing my neon dreams
Oh-oh, oh-oh, I won't let them slip away
I'm reaching for the stars, I'm feeling unstoppable
I'm chasing my neon dreams, they'll never fade
